ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | fvmptdf.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. D ) |

| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_fvmptdf | |- ( ph -> ( F = ( x e. D |-> B ) -> ps ) ) |
